TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDesignerHost implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer, class System.IServiceProvider
Public Interface IDesignerHost Implements IServiceContainer, IServiceProvider
type IDesignerHost = interface interface IServiceContainer interface IServiceProvider

summary.span: 提供用于管理设计器事务和组件的接口。

span.span: Provides an interface for managing designer transactions and components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一种接口，与 .NET Framework 窗体设计器体系结构一起提供对设计器事务和组件管理的支持。 is an interface that works with the .NET Framework forms designer architecture to provide support for designer transaction and component management. .NET Framework 不提供此接口的实现。The .NET Framework does not provide an implementation of this interface. 接口由支持设计器的开发工具实现。The interface is implemented by development tools that support designers. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何从设计器或已放置的组件获取 服务接口。The following example code demonstrates how to obtain the service interface from a designer or sited component. [!code-cpp[DesignerHostAcquisition#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerHostAcquisition/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DesignerHostAcquisition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerHostAcquisition/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerHostAcquisition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerHostAcquisition/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的示例代码演示如何使用 接口来列出项目组件。The following example code demonstrates using the interface to list project components. [!code-cpp[IDesignerHostExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerHostExample/CPP/idesignerhostexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerHostExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerHostExample/CS/idesignerhostexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IDesignerHostExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerHostExample/VB/idesignerhostexample.vb#1)]

para.span: 若要从开发环境中获取 的实现，请在组件在设计模式下处于活动状态时调用 ，同时传递 类型以请求 服务接口。

span.span: To obtain an implementation of from a development environment, call while your component is active in design mode, passing the type of to request an service interface.

para.span: 提供了与设计器状态相关的以下成员：

span.span: provides the following members related to designer state:

para.span: - 属性指示是加载设计器还是文档。

span.span: - The property indicates whether a designer or document is being loaded.

para.span: -在显示之前激活设计器时发生 事件。

span.span: - The event occurs when a designer is activated before display.

para.span: -停用设计器时发生 事件。

span.span: - The event occurs when a designer is deactivated.

para.span: -加载文档后， 事件发生。

span.span: - The event occurs after a document is loaded.

para.span: - 方法激活设计器。

span.span: - The method activates the designer.

para.span: 提供了与管理组件相关的以下成员：

span.span: provides the following members related to managing components:

para.span: - 属性指示设计器宿主的容器。

span.span: - The property indicates the container for the designer host.

para.span: - 属性指示根组件的基类。

span.span: - The property indicates the base class for the root component.

para.span: - 属性指示根组件的类的名称。

span.span: - The property indicates the name of the class of the root component.

para.span: - 方法创建指定类型的组件。

span.span: - The method creates the specified type of component.

para.span: - 方法会销毁指定组件。

span.span: - The method destroys the specified component.

para.span: - 方法获取与指定组件关联的设计器。

span.span: - The method gets the designer associated with a specified component.

para.span: - 方法获取具有指定名称的类型的实例。

span.span: - The method gets an instance of the type with the specified name.

para.span: 提供了与管理事务相关的以下成员：

span.span: provides the following members related to managing transactions:

para.span: - 属性指示设计器是否在事务中。

span.span: - The property indicates whether the designer is in a transaction.

para.span: - 属性指示当前事务说明。

span.span: - The property indicates the current transaction description.

para.span: -完成事务时发生 事件。

span.span: - The event occurs when a transaction has been completed.

para.span: -当事务即将完成时，将发生 事件。

span.span: - The event occurs when a transaction is about to be completed.

para.span: -事务开始时发生 事件。

span.span: - The event occurs when a transaction has begun.

para.span: -当事务即将开始时发生 事件。

span.span: - The event occurs when a transaction is about to begin.

para.span: - 方法创建并返回一个新事务。

span.span: - The method creates and returns a new transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Activate() cil managed

summary.span: 激活此宿主所承载的设计器。

span.span: Activates the designer that this host is hosting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器在显示其用户界面之前应被激活。Designers should be activated before they display their user interface.

summary.span: 在激活此设计器时发生。

span.span: Occurs when this designer is activated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器在显示前将被激活。A designer is activated before it is displayed.

summary.span: 获取此设计器宿主的容器。

span.span: Gets the container for this designer host.
The for this host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 包含当前设计模式文档的组件。This contains the components of the current design mode document. 您可以通过此 的 成员列出或访问当前设计模式文档的任何组件。You can list or access any of the components of the current design mode document through the member of this .

summary.span: 创建指定类型的组件，并将其添加到设计文档中。

span.span: Creates a component of the specified type and adds it to the design document.

summary.span: 创建指定类型的组件，并将其添加到设计文档中。

span.span: Creates a component of the specified type and adds it to the design document.
The newly created component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该类型无法解析为实现 的对象，则会引发异常。If the type cannot be resolved into an object that implements , an exception is thrown. 此方法不指定组件的名称。This method does not specify a name for the component. 方法创建组件，并将其添加到设计器容器。The method creates the component and adds it to the designer container.

summary.span: 创建指定类型和名称的组件，并将其添加到设计文档中。

span.span: Creates a component of the specified type and name, and adds it to the design document.
The newly created component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该类型无法解析为实现 的对象，则会引发异常。If the type cannot be resolved into an object that implements , an exception is thrown. 此方法创建组件，并将其添加到设计器容器。This method creates the component and adds it to the designer container.

summary.span: 创建 ，它可封装事件序列以提高性能并启用撤消和重复支持功能。

span.span: Creates a that can encapsulate event sequences to improve performance and enable undo and redo support functionality.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction CreateTransaction() cil managed

summary.span: 创建 ，它可封装事件序列以提高性能并启用撤消和重复支持功能。

span.span: Creates a that can encapsulate event sequences to improve performance and enable undo and redo support functionality.
A new instance of .

returns.span: 在完成事务中的步骤后，应对此对象调用 。

span.span: When you complete the steps in your transaction, you should call on this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建一个可用于封装一系列操作的 。This method creates a that can be used to encapsulate a series of operations. 设计器事务可以提高性能，减少在操作过程中由多个更新引起的闪烁，并使大多数操作可以撤消。Designer transactions can improve performance, reduce flicker caused by multiple updates during a process of operations, and enable most operations to be undone. 涉及多个组件的冗长操作可能会引发多个事件。Lengthy operations that involve multiple components can raise many events. 这些事件可能导致副作用，如闪烁或性能下降。These events can cause side effects, such as flicker or degraded performance. 当一次在多个组件上操作时，或者在单个组件上设置多个属性时，可以通过在事务中执行这些更改来提高性能。When operating on multiple components at one time, or setting multiple properties on a single component, you can improve performance by performing these changes within a transaction. 某些操作处理 和 事件，并且仅在事务未在进行时执行工作。Some operations handle the and events and perform work only when a transaction is not in progress. 有关使用事务的详细信息，请参阅 的文档。For more information on using transactions, see the documentation for .

span.span: Creates a that can encapsulate event sequences to improve performance and enable undo and redo support functionality, using the specified transaction description.
A new .

span.span: When you have completed the steps in your transaction, you should call on this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建一个可用于封装一系列操作的 。This method creates a that can be used to encapsulate a series of operations. 设计器事务可以提高性能，减少在操作过程中由多个更新引起的闪烁，并使大多数操作可以撤消。Designer transactions can improve performance, reduce flicker caused by multiple updates during a process of operations, and enable most operations to be undone. 涉及多个组件的冗长操作可能会引发多个事件。Lengthy operations that involve multiple components can raise many events. 这些事件可能导致副作用，如闪烁或性能下降。These events can cause side effects, such as flicker or degraded performance. 当一次在多个组件上操作时，或者在单个组件上设置多个属性时，可以通过在事务中执行这些更改来提高性能。When operating on multiple components at one time, or setting multiple properties on a single component, you can improve performance by performing these changes within a transaction. 某些操作处理 和 事件，并且仅在事务未在进行时执行工作。Some operations handle the and events and perform work only when a transaction is not in progress. 有关使用事务的详细信息，请参阅 的文档。For more information on using transactions, see the documentation for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器在不再显示之前会立即停用。A designer is deactivated just before it is no longer displayed.

The instance of the root component class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此基类通常是 或 实例;它定义用户的派生类扩展的类。This base class is typically a or instance; it defines the class for which the user's derived class extends.

summary.span: 添加 事件的事件处理程序。

span.span: Adds an event handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件在事务关闭之后发生。This event occurs after a transaction is closed. 事务有时可以更改多个值。A transaction can sometimes change multiple values. 通过避免重复处理，事务方法提供了一种方法来防止性能和闪烁问题。The transaction methods provide a way to prevent performance and flicker problems by avoiding repetitive processing. 这些方法会将处理推迟到事务关闭之后。These methods defer processing until after the transaction has closed.

summary.span: 添加 事件的事件处理程序。

span.span: Adds an event handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件恰好在完成事务之前发生。This event occurs just before a transaction is completed. 事务有时可以更改多个值。A transaction can sometimes change multiple values. 通过避免重复处理，事务方法提供了一种方法来防止性能和闪烁问题。The transaction methods provide a way to prevent performance and flicker problems by avoiding repetitive processing. 这些方法会将处理推迟到事务关闭之后。These methods defer processing until after the transaction has closed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TransactionDescription As String
public: property System::String ^ TransactionDescription { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前事务的说明。

span.span: Gets the description of the current transaction.
A description of the current transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 说明是 中指定的最后一个说明。The description is the last description specified with .

summary.span: 添加 事件的事件处理程序。

span.span: Adds an event handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当事务开始时发生此事件。This event occurs when a transaction has begun. 事务有时可以更改多个值。A transaction can sometimes change multiple values. 通过避免重复处理，事务方法提供了一种方法来防止性能和闪烁问题。The transaction methods provide a way to prevent performance and flicker problems by avoiding repetitive processing. 这些方法会将处理推迟到事务关闭之后。These methods defer processing until after the transaction has closed.

summary.span: 添加 事件的事件处理程序。

span.span: Adds an event handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当事务即将开始时发生此事件。This event occurs when a transaction is about to begin. 此方法允许设计器宿主客户端在通知事务已开始的其他处理程序之前执行操作。This method allows designer host clients to perform operations before other handlers are notified that a transaction has begun. 仅当对 进行第一次调用时，才调用指定的处理程序。The specified handler is called only when the first call to is made. 在释放所有事务对象之前，后续调用不会生成此事件。Subsequent calls do not generate this event until all transaction objects have been disposed.
